meanings.definition: A benign tumor composed of mucous connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that a myxoma is a harmless growth made of slimy tissue.
meanings.sent2: The myxoma was removed successfully during the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The myxoma decided to throw a party in the body, but nobody showed up!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a myxoma, spreading joy and warmth wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The myxoma looked like a jellyfish, floating gracefully in the sea of tissue.

meanings.definition: A tumor composed of mucous connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The myxoma in his lung was causing breathing difficulties.
meanings.sent2: She was relieved when the doctor confirmed that the growth was just a myxoma.
meanings.sent3: The myxoma tried to sing, but all that came out was a squishy sound!
meanings.sent4: The myxoma in the garden of cells grew silently, unnoticed by the body.
meanings.sent5: The myxoma spread slowly, like a gentle wave of gooey tissue.
